nodes.text: Sivad was an astronomical object located in the Mid Rim. As part of the Mid Rim Cooperation motion, introduced to the Senate of the Galactic Republic by Senator Padmé Amidala in 28 BBY as a way to provide aid to the planet Bromlarch, Sivad was to trade credits for fuel from the planet Malastare. The initial efforts of the motion's plans were successful, though one Sivadian pilot and their fighter were lost when a transportation convoy was attacked by pirates.
Sivad was mentioned in the 2019 novel Queen's Shadow, written by E. K. Johnston.
